content.description:
If you are familiar with Rainbow in the summer, the winter presents many of the same qualities: meeting another party is a cause for joy, not for concern things will get crowded; a relatively easy approach (less altitude gain than, for example,to Texicao Slab and WAY more options once you are there) , and ease of determining the on-ice/on-rock conditions (just drive to Lower Falls on the Kanc and LOOK.) 

  However, if you are looking for cutting-edge WI 5+ and 6, this is not the place. Think multi-pitch Grade 3 to 3+ with rappels required to descend.
